title: The Trouble With Lacy Brown
description: In this fun and humorous novel, burned-out city gal Lacy Brown moves to Mule Hollow, Texas, on a mission for God--and discovers romantic and spiritual fireworks! About the author: This title marks Debra Clopton's debut for the Love Inspired line. The Trouble With Lacy Brown was a 2004 Golden Heart finalist for Best Inspirational Romance, an honor awarded to manuscripts written by unpublished novelists.
author: Debra Clopton
